Name: File Type
Description: Type of file, e.g. MP3, Group WMO, Root ADT, M2, etc

Name: Expansion (Added)
Description: Which expansion the file was added in

Name: Patch (Added)
Description: Which patch the file was added in

Name: Build (Added)
Description: Which build the file was added in

Name: Model Type
Description: Type of model

Name: Parent File
Description: Files referencing this file (experimental/limit test)

Name: Filename Status
Description: Filename status (tied to wow-listfile repo, automated test)

Name: Continent
Description: Continent this file is related to

Name: Zone
Description: Zone this file is related to

Name: Doodad Set
Description: Doodad set this file is a part of

Name: Music Type
Description: Type of music (zone music, scene music, etc)

Name: Texture Type
Description: Type of texture (icon, creature skin, etc)

Name: Mount Type
Description: Type of mount (ground, flying, customizable, etc)

Name: Item Source
Description: Source of related item (e.g. drop, trading post, shop, etc)

Name: Model Feature
Description: Model features (e.g. physics, animations, particles)

Name: Sound Type
Description: Sound type (e.g. character, UI, spell, etc)

Name: Race
Description: File is tied to a player/NPC race

Name: CreatureName
Description: Creature name (e.g. NPC or mount name) tied to this file

Name: SpellName
Description: Spell names using this file

Name: ItemName
Description: Item names using this file

Name: M2 Size
Description: Physical size of M2 model

Name: M2 Complexity
Description: M2 model complexity (todo: vertice count based? more?)

Name: Encryption Status
Description: CASC encryption status of a file

Name: File Branch (Current)
Description: Which WoW branch a file is currently present on

Name: File Branch (Historical)
Description: Which WoW branch a file has historically been present on (and may have been deleted since)
